Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka will be up against the West Indies in the 1st match of the West Indies in Sri Lanka, 3 ODI Series, 2024 at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy on 20th October 2024 at 02:30 PM IST.
In their last 5 games, West Indies have won 1 game and lost 4. In their last 5 games, Sri Lanka have won 3 games and lost 1.

Both teams last played against each other in the Super Sixes - Match 9 of the ICC Cricket World Cup Qualifiers, 2023 where Pathum Nissanka scored the highest fantasy points for Sri Lanka with 138 match fantasy points while Keacy Carty topped the fantasy points leaderboard for West Indies with 103 match fantasy points.

The pitch at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy will allow for good stroke play and the batters will find it easy to bat on the surface. The surface will not allow a lot of assistance to the bowlers and wicket taking is not going to be easy. The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 236 runs. The team batting first at this venue has won 40% of its matches, so the toss does not make much of a difference here. The team winning the toss may decide to bat or bowl depending on the ground conditions today.
Temperature is expected to be around 27.15 °C with 70% humidity. 3.57 m/s winds are expected. There is light rain expected which may affect playing conditions.
The venue is suited for both Pacers and Spinners alike.
In the 64 matches played between these 2 teams, Batter of both teams have earned the most fantasy points for their respective teams so far.
